summary: Frontend testing completed for Live Jobs fixes: Resume dropdown, Success rate display, and Auto-apply status panel. All requested features verified working correctly.
passed_tests: Resume selection dropdown shows resumes with proper badges (Primary, ATS score)
Resume selection uses correct field (resume_id || id fallback)
Success rate displays correctly as 52% (based on 14 submitted, 13 failed)
Auto-apply status panel shows correct stats: Today=0, Submitted=14, Failed=13, Success Rate=52%
Scheduler is running and configured for daily auto-apply at 12:00 PM UTC
Live Jobs page loads with job recommendations
Apply dialog opens with resume selection dropdown
Console logs show auto-apply status being loaded correctly

resume_dropdown_badges.details: Resume dropdown shows: test_resume.txt with Primary badge (green) and ATS: 78 badge. Code uses resume_id || id as fallback for value.

success_rate_display.details: Success rate displays as 52% in blue text. Backend returns total_submitted=14, total_failed=13, success_rate=52.

auto_apply_stats_panel.details: Stats panel shows: Today=0, Submitted=14 (green), Failed=13 (red), Success Rate=52% (blue)

scheduler_status.details: Scheduler running with daily job at 12:00 PM UTC. Next run: 2026-02-03T12:00:00+00:00

critical_code_review_comments: Resume select correctly uses resume_id || id fallback pattern (line 1219)
Badges display correctly: Master (violet), Variant (blue), Primary (green), ATS score (outline)
Auto-apply status loaded via console.log for debugging (line 362)
Stats panel correctly displays total_submitted, total_failed, and success_rate from API
context_for_next_testing_agent: All three reported issues have been fixed and verified: 1) Resume dropdown now shows resumes with Primary/Master/Variant/ATS badges and uses resume_id correctly, 2) Success rate displays as 52% (not 0%), 3) Auto-apply scheduler is running daily at 12:00 PM UTC. The auto-apply status API returns correct data: total_submitted=14, total_failed=13, success_rate=52.
